ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Iskar Monk
ygData.msgSnippet: ... http://everquest.allakhazam.com/db/quest.html?quest=261 Warlord Zyzz desires the return of four Scorpion Pincers off of Scorpions. Return them for xp, some
ygData.messageBody:
djsgibb wrote:

> Hey everyone,
> I have a Iskar Monk and he is at LVL 6. Working at the field of bone
> and I have a couple questions. What are the larg scorpion pinchers


http://everquest.allakhazam.com/db/quest.html?quest=261

Warlord Zyzz desires the return of four Scorpion Pincers off of
Scorpions. Return them for xp, some coin and increased faction
with LegionOfCabilis, CabilisResidents, ScaledMystics,
CrusadersOfGreenmist and the Swifttails.


> for? What weapons should I envest in to get and where can i get them?

none until level 20, after that it makes it easier to have
something like "Cane of Tranquil". other items are there as
well, especially because of luclin, but check their weight.

but i think some high level monks should answer to this, because
my two monks are only 27 and 20.


Biltilie Dwimmerlaik
level 53 female gnome magician
Tarew Marr
